Texts.Chs: 请不要让你的家畜们饿肚子，当你喂饱了它们，它们才会成长得更快，并且能更快地交配繁殖。喂食只需要靠近它们，然后按^green;[Q]^reset;丢出家畜饲料。
Texts.Eng: The more fed your animals are, the happier they are. They'll mature from babies faster, and (soon)will be more liable to mate and produce offspring. Just drop the feed near them with the Q key!

Texts.Chs: 要想家畜快快生长，你需要一些^orange;家畜饲料^reset;，把^orange;玉米^reset;放入^orange;研磨机^reset;，就可以得到了。
Texts.Eng: ^orange;Livestock^reset; grow a whole lot faster when you toss them some ^orange;Cattle Feed^reset; to munch on. ^orange;Grind up corn^reset; in your ^orange;Hand Mill^reset; to get some.
